titles.title: Hold on a little longer, hold on a little stronger

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hold on a little longer, hold on a little stronger
The testings of the Lord are pure as gold
He may take you through the fire, but He'll burn out dross and mire
So, hold on a little longer, hold on.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You took the hand of Jesus, and stood upon His promise
It seems you have trusted in vain
But the answer you have prayed for
is on its way and is paid for.
So, hold on a little longer, hold on.
